Crate bdf_reader

Expand description

BDF Reader

A reader for the BDF (Glyph Bitmap Distribution Format) font format.

Example

ⓘ
use bdf_reader::Font;
use std::{fs::File, io::BufReader};

let reader = BufReader::new(File::open("path/to/font.bdf")?);
let font = Font::read(reader)?;
